property.name: Text
property.value: Remove the following cards from the encounter deck: 2 Hobbit-lands; 2 A Nice Pickle; More like a Grocer; Troll Cave; Troll Purse; and the 7 Sack cards. Add only the enemy cards from the Wilderlands and Seventh Level encounter sets to the encounter deck and shuffle it. Shuffle the 7 Sack cards face down to form a Sack deck.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Response: After a unqiue Troll enemy (Bert, Tom, William) is defeated or after a Troll Camp leaves play as an explored location, the first player chooses and discards a Sack card from play.
Forced: At the start of the refresh phase, remove all Troll enemies from the discard pile and add them to the staging area.
The players win if there at least 5 Troll enemies in the victory display and there are no Troll enemies in play
